caption.p: Viremia in vaccinated and mock-vaccinated calves following virulent RVFV challenge. ND, not detected and indicates the animal number. Dashed line (- - - -) denotes cut-off point between positive (below line) and negative (above line). (A) - qRT-PCR Ct values for mock-vaccinated animals and (B) vaccinated animals after challenge with RVFV.
